headline: Apple Offers as Much as $150 Million for Formula One U.S. Rights
summary: The bid puts F1 on track for a significantly more lucrative deal than it has with its current partner, Disney’s ESPN.

headline: Why FuboTV Stock Skyrocketed 206% in the First Half of the Year
summary: The move will triple Fubo's subscriber base, leading the stock to roughly triple.  The stock's gains came entirely from news of the merger, as the Disney deal, which will merge Fubo with Hulu + Live TV, values the sports streaming stock significantly higher than what it was trading for before the news.
